articles.title: Scaling AI for Language: Community-Driven Approaches to Multilingual AI Development — UNDP & Neuravox
articles.excerpt: A collaborative community paper exploring pathways for scaling AI language technologies through community partnerships and multilateral cooperation.
articles.content: A comprehensive analysis of community-driven approaches to multilingual AI development, examining how international partnerships can accelerate inclusive language technology deployment across diverse communities.
articles.author: UNDP & Neuravox
articles.collaboration: A collaborative community paper — Neuravox (contributor) with UNDP and partners.
